name: Commissionit
description:
The place to get unique content, designs and commissions made for you or simply buy bespoke works for corporates and individuals.

As a Social Enterprise, we also raise money for good causes.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Amin Saleem
team.bioHtml: A visionary and strategic thinker. Founded & sold an award-winning online reverse auction, taking over £230m in orders, reaching over 1m unique users.

jobs.title: Part time Full Stack Developer and part time CTO required
jobs.description:
Looking for a full stack developer to initially provide part-time support to our project https://www.smartdealmaker.com/what-we-do & https://app.commissionit.com/bingsearch

I have enclosed a tech stack overview to see what has been developed.

The ideal person will work paid for first but would then want to potentially get strategically involved with the project as a (remote) CTO and also have .php experience.

You need to know Angular, Azure, C# / .Net, SignalR
